text: Eduardo López Banzo is a Spanish harpsichordist and conductor of baroque music. Banzo was born in Zaragoza, Spain. He studied harpsichord with Gustav Leonhardt in Amsterdam.Interview by J. Romero 1997 In 1988 Banzo founded the group Al Ayre Español, which specialises in Spanish baroque music, of composers such as Literes. They were awarded Spain's Premio Nacional de Música in 2004.Al Ayre Español Banzo has premiered several operas at the annual Festival de Beaune in Burgundy. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Spanish conductors (music) Category:Male conductors (music) Category:Living people Category:Harpsichordists Category:21st-century conductors (music) Category:21st-century male musicians
title: Eduardo López Banzo
